overview: Legendary porn pioneer John Stagliano distills his favorite kinks for obsessive fans (like himself) in “Buttman Focused 8,” a graphic illustration of 16 fetishistic categories — structured to enable fellow perverts to instantly access the images and topics that best get them off! Over six-and-a-half hours of footage from Buttman’s hottest productions has been organized and assembled for concentrated appreciation of: Wedgie, Camel Toe, Walking Butts, My Nose Your Crack, Hot Babes, Tight Clothes and Ass, Boobs, Suck It, Messy, Pussy Tease, Pussy Close-Up, Orgasm, Pussy Torture, Tit Torture and Bare Ass & Gapes. This thematic feast (including one full hour of just Butthole footage!) is handmade porn for the discriminating one-handed viewer.
title: Buttman Focused 8
